description: This scholarship was established in 2018 by members of the McLinn family in honor of Chase McLinn, who passed away in 2017 at the age of 30. Chase was a musician and music was his passion. He taught himself to play acoustic guitar and quickly expanded to keyboards, percussion and music synthesizers, mixing and composing his own songs. Chase graduated from Edmond Santa Fe High School in 2005 and completed Music Production School in Oklahoma City. Eligibility Music education major Sophomore, junior or senior Cumulative GPA 2.5+ Demonstrate financial need Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
